MonsterTrait.Name: Brute
MonsterTrait.Text: A melee weapon deals one extra die of its damage when the bugbear hits with it (included in the attack).

MonsterTrait.Name: Surprise Attack
MonsterTrait.Text: If the bugbear surprises a creature and hits it with an attack during the first round of combat, the target takes an extra 7 (2d6) damage from the attack.

MonsterTrait.Name: Heart of Hruggek
MonsterTrait.Text: The bugbear has advantage on saving throws against being charmed, frightened, paralyzed, poisoned, stunned, or put to sleep.

MonsterTrait.Name: Multiattack
MonsterTrait.Text: The bugbear makes two melee attacks

MonsterAction.Name: Morningstar
MonsterAction.Text: Melee Weapon Attack: +5 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. Hit: 11 (2d8 + 3) piercing damage.

MonsterAction.Name: Javelin
MonsterAction.Text: Melee or Ranged Weapon Attack: +5 to hit, reach 5 ft. or range 30/120 ft., one target. Hit: 9 (2d6 + 3) piercing damage in melee or 5 (1d6 + 3) piercing damage at range.
